amendatorysection.catchline: Motor vehicle; inflatable restraint system; prohibited acts; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: (1) No person shall knowingly install or reinstall in a motor vehicle, as part of the motor vehicle's inflatable restraint system, any object or material other than an air bag designed for the make, model, and year of the motor vehicle.
(2) A person violating this section is guilty of a Class I misdemeanor.
